    Theorems about Array. #

    Preliminaries #

    toList #

    source
    @[simp]
    theorem Array.toList_inj {α : Type u_1} {a b : Array α} :
    a.toList = b.toList ↔ a = b
    source
    @[simp]
    theorem Array.toList_eq_nil_iff {α : Type u_1} (l : Array α) :
